title: FURNISHED LUX PENTHOUSE CORNER | WRAP-AROUND BALCONY | TOP RENOVATION
posting_body: ['Stunning corner condo with wrap-around balcony and *breathtaking* with direct western and southern view of Biscayne Bay, Star Island and Downtown Miami Skyline enveloped in spectacular sunsets every evening and city lights at night.', 'This renovated 2 bedroom/2 bathroom condo features modern open view kitchen with Botticino marble counters in the kitchen and bathrooms, and state of the art beachwood floor throughout the apartment.', 'The Floridian is a full amenities building with 2 pools, gyms, spa, market, tennis court and clubhouse.', 'Valet parking and high speed internet is included in the rent, Tenant only pays electricity.', "Amazing SoBe DeniZen location short idyllic walk to Whole Foods Market, Oliver's Bistro, Pura Vida Cafe, Taste Bakery Cafe, Macchialina, Umbra Caffé, Giotto's Pizza, Whitman's Burgers and more.", 'Brand new park across the street and great baywalk behind the building for recreational and dog walking, with easy access to the MacArthur Causeway just two blocks south on the same avenue, right from the garage.', 'Call, text or email us to see this one of a kind, BEST DIRECT WATERFRONT VALUE and Location on South Beach while it IS still available.', 'D. Michael Di Vico | (305) 204-8ZEN (8936)', '<URL>', 'Commercial & Residential', '1000 Fifth Street', 'Second Floor', 'Miami Beach, FL 33139']
